name: Motion Angel Wings SEE VIDEO!!
description:
The Wings opens to 4 feet wide in 3 seconds.  These wings can open and close more than a hundred times if you're selecting the rechargeable battery version. A hand held control switch lets you open and close the wings and turn the lights on and off. Straps to your back like a backpack with 2 inch wide straps. Can easily be worn for over an hour comfortably.

Note:  Only NiMH (Nickel Metal Hydride) batteries can be used in these wings!  NiMH batteries have much higher available power than even the best disposable batteries and are the only type of batteries that can be used with the wings.

We also have the CO2 version Powered by pressurized CO2 gas.  Comes with 6 refill cartridges and the wings are controlled by a hand held control pad. CO2 is loaded into the tanks on the wings via a bicycle tire style connector.  If CO2 cartridges are not available these wings can also be refilled at gas stations and wherever compressed air is available.

And last a simplified un-powered pull cord version of the Angelic Wings. No CO2, no batteries, easy to use.  Simply pull the cord and latch it in place to open the wings.  Then just pull again and the wings close.  Featuring 2 inch wide straps and clasps to tighten (not shown). 4 foot wingspan open and 18 inch wingspan shut.

Options: (Contact Us)
Painted Wings - Brass, Copper or Gold $90
Brushed Aluminum Wings - $90
LED Lights  - $100
Padding - $95
Custom Blade Patterns - $300
Lasers - $500


Video: 
-----------------------------

<iframe width="338" height="189" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/rSu-j6IUVM0?rel=0" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

name: Piston Powered Robot Glove (Left or Right Hand)
description:
Articulated mechanical glove with powered pistons assist function. This piston powered gloves allows you to apply significant strength at the push of a button. Made with the toughest parts available. While deactivated the glove allows you freely to move your fingers in any direction. When activated all the fingers close with a strong. To operate simply put your hand inside and lock shut using the velcro straps. The gauntlet works around you, allowing you to control the movement of the fingers and thumb. Press a button to activate the pistons assist function causing the glove to close with force! . The grip speed can be adjusted allowing the gauntlets to snap shut in a split second or close smoothly and firmly. 

Available in Large and Small

Large fits everyone 5'10" and above. Small would fit anyone below that height and would possess similar power output. The pictures above show the large version

Standard Construction Time: 4-7 weeks *

* We recommend allowing extra time approaching busy holidays such as Halloween, Christmas and Spring. Order early. Shipping will be an additional 3-12 days.

-----------------------------


<iframe width="338" height="189" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/uelxUEoGhD4?rel=0" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>


If selecting a laser bracelet over 5mW, you should be aware that it is not FDA compliant and is intended for use in countries that do not require FDA Class IIIb certification for lasers over 5mW. Because of the compact design the bracelet doesn't have the 5-point system which includes: key switch, interlock, aperture shutter, power LED, and 3-second delay. If you need these features you should consider a normal laser pointer product.
_____________________________

name: Cycle Up Bracelet (Gold, Chrome or Black)
description:
Cyclist doesn't just love to ride. They love speeding along, nothing between them and the world, feeling the wheels spin under their own power. This street-ready wristband lets you or the cycling enthusiast in your life stay connected to their wheels, even when they're not free to ride. Formed into a zigzag bracelet. The bracelet comes in a sealed artistic soup can.

-  Powder Coated, Chrome or Gold Plated
- 2.5" dia. x .75" W 
- Care: wipe with a soft cloth. Do not use jewelry polish 
- Sold individually 
- Made in the US

name: Exit Wound! Bullet Earrings (3 styles available)
description:
Genuine fired bullet brass earrings. Great looking addition to any ensemble! You will most assuredly get comments on them at the range or out at dinner.

I build to order with ample cases in the calibers listed below. I am also more than happy to create a custom work from brass that may have personal or sentimental meaning to you.
These are real fired cases, as such, they show all beauty enhancing wear marks associated with containing a small explosion and being sent flying out of a chamber. Each piece is truly one of a kind. All earrings will share the same manufacture (head-stamp) as a matched set.

Readily available brass:
.45 ACP (Nickel plated and Brass)
9mm
.223/5.56 Military Round
